content: I've heard of using steam to create a crispy crust, but I've never tried it before. I'll definitely give it a shot with my ciabatta recipe. Speaking of which, I created a sourdough starter from scratch last weekend and made a delicious boule using it. I'm excited to try out this ciabatta recipe and see how it turns out. Do you have any tips on how to store ciabatta to keep it fresh for a longer period?
